subject: #SSN1738 Simsonn Shipping Confirmation
description_text: Hi, your order was returned due to not being able to pass customs, please provide the Korean name that matches the customs code you provided. We will ask the logistics provider to reship your order as soon as possible.

conversations.body_text:
Do I need my customs code and my Korean name in English or only my Korean
name in English? Please reply.

2025년 7월 1일 (화) 15:37, support@simsonn.com

Hi Bikinibroek965,    We provided Customs with your English name “Hyukjin seo” and your Personal Customs Code: P210004867170. However, it didn't go through Customs because the two pieces of information didn't match. So we need you to provide the matching information again.

Yes, I gave you the correct code and my name. The code is P210004867170, my
last name is Seo, and my name is Hyukjin. All the information is correct,
but I don't know where there is a mistake.

2025년 7월 1일 (화) 19:43, support@simsonn.com
Hi Bikinibroek965,    We will confirm with the logistics company, please don't worry. And it may be safer if you can provide your name in Korean.

The Korean name is 서혁진.

2025년 7월 1일 (화) 19:58, support@simsonn.com
Hi Bikinibroek965,    Thank you for the information.

How far has the delivery been made?

2025년 7월 1일 (화) 20:03, support@simsonn.com
Hi Bikinibroek965,     Your package has been reshipped and is expected to arrive for you around the 14th, sorry for the inconvenience. https://t.17track.net/en#nums=YT2518800708506443

Thank you for letting me know. Have a nice day.

2025년 7월 9일 (수) 18:45, support@simsonn.com

Hi Bikinibroek965,  I noticed you purchased a Pro X Ultra control box, may I ask what pedals you are using, if they are not Pro X pedals, we will send Plus X control boxes by default, as they work the same for pedals other than the Pro X.

I'm currently using a plus x pedal. If you want to send me another item,
will you refund the rest of the amount? If the rest of the money is
refunded, I would be fine.
2025년 7월 15일 (화) 오후 5:43, support@simsonn.com
Hi Bikinibroek965,    Plus X doesn't need an additional control box, could you please send us a photo of the control box to confirm?

[image: 20250715_204202.jpg]
[image: 2873b481-4976-47db-b90f-6a8587ceb479.jpg]

This is the picture.
The mail I sent you before was a little strange
I mean, I ordered a Pro X, but if I downgrade it to a Plus X, the price
will be lower, so I would like to ask if I can get a refund for the
difference that occurred there.
---------- Forwarded message ---------
보낸사람: support@simsonn.com
Hi Bikinibroek965,  Of course the difference will be refunded for you, so please don't worry. Thank you for your confirmation.

Thank you. So, just to confirm, using the control box for the Plus X won’t
cause any compatibility issues with the VAM Pro, correct?

2025년 7월 16일 (수) 12:10, support@simsonn.com
Hi Bikinibroek965,    Don't worry, it's fully compatible.
